Land Cover Types

IMAGE-LAND features 20 land cover types, namely:

  1. Agricultural land

  2. Extensive grassland

  3. Carbon plantation

  4. Regrowth forest (abandoning)

  5. Regrowth forest (timber)

  6. Biofuels

  7. Ice

  8. Tundra

  9. Wooded tundra

  10. Boreal forest

  11. Cool conifer forest

  12. Temp. mixed forest

  13. Temp. decid. forest

  14. Warm mixed forest

  15. Grassland/steppe

  16. Hot desert

  17. Scrubland

  18. Savanna

  19. Tropical woodland

  20. Tropical forest. Extensive grassland is the land cover type allocated to agricultural land which has fallen below a threshold of productivity (WHICH VALUE?).
